DISQUALIFY.LACK_EXP: Candidate does not have enough experience
DISQUALIFY.OUTDATED_CV: Candidate CV is out of date
DISQUALIFY.INCOMPLETE_CV: Candidate CV does not have enough detail
DISQUALIFY.WRONG_LANGUAGE_CV: Candidate CV is not in the English language
DISQUALIFY.CONFLICT: Candidate is already working or has previously worked with the client
DISQUALIFY.DUPLICATE: Candidate has already been submitted for this job
